# displayedProperty

**Instance Property**

The property currently displayed in the record list.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var displayedProperty: String! { get set }
```

## Working with Properties in the Record List

- **addProperty(_:)**: Adds a property to the group of properties whose values are shown in the record list.
- **columnTitle(forProperty:)**: Returns the title of a custom property.
- **properties()**: Returns an array of the properties whose values are shown in the record list.
- **removeProperty(_:)**: Removes a property from the group of properties whose values are shown in the record list.
- **setColumnTitle(_:forProperty:)**: Sets the title displayed in the people picker for a property.
